update(double) - Method in class org.spaceinvaders.classes.Entity

update(double) - Method in class org.spaceinvaders.classes.Scene
Updates all game objects in the scene.
Uses delta time to maintain same game speed on slower PCs or in case of FPS limit change
update(double) - Method in class org.spaceinvaders.entities.Enemy
Updates the enemy state and fires a projectile
update(double) - Method in class org.spaceinvaders.entities.Player
Updates the player's state This includes handling movement and firing projectiles
update(double) - Method in class org.spaceinvaders.entities.Projectile
Updates the projectile's state If the projectile moves off the screen, it is destroyed

Updates the game state, handles wave progression, and scene transitions
